mdRecord.dcterms:title: Chamber Orchestra of Southwest Virginia Feb 17-18
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for Chamber Orchestra of Southwest Virginia. Barber: Knoxville, Summer of 1915. Nancy McDuffie, soprano. Ginastera: Variaciones Concertantes. Music by Copland, Wagner & C.P.E. Bach.

Virginia
